info.title: COVID Modeling
info.description:
Users who have already authenticated will be able to use the documentation page to access any of the endpoints without further authentication. However, to access the API through any other means (curl etc.), you will need to obtain a token.

 You can do so using the `/user/token` endpoint. This should then be supplied with any further requests e.g. 
```
curl -X 'GET' \
 'https://${SERVER}/api/simulations' \
 -H 'accept: application/json' \
 -H 'Authorization: Bearer ${TOKEN}
```

token.name: Authorization
token.description: Primary authentication method for programmatic use.
